name: The Dream of Shadowlands
description:
***Current build is not a polished demo! It is just a preview for what the finished demo, and finished game will be like!***

When someone is truly hated, they may find themselves forced out of the safety of the light and into the unforgiving dark. “The Dream of Shadowlands” follows a girl facing this very dilemma, waking up in a strange, twisted world unlike the one she knows. Forming an alliance with a demon, she must traverse this nightmarish place to find her way home.

"The Dream of Shadowlands" is a top-down rpg inspired by the RPGMaker horror niche. It features art assets that were drawn traditionally with ink and paper, and a retro style based on 90's anime. 

Currently in development, this is my very first game and I am a solo dev so new content comes a bit slowly. I will occasionally upload work in progress builds here leading up to the official demo! I appreciate any and all support, especially comments since it means everything to me when people take the time to engage with something original I make.

DEFAULT GAME CONTROLS (Can be remapped in settings)

WASD - Move, toggle menu items

I - Select, interact

J - Block

K - Attack

L - Item

Shift - Dash

Esc - Pause

F - Toggle fullscreen

Enter - Skip Dialogue

DIY PROJECTS

This game features printable DIY versions of key items, which will be kept up-to-date here as I add a new one with each level.
